text: HERE is a project that will be welcomed by the family man or father-to-be. Unlike many commercial articles, this chair is solidly built and capable of withstanding the heavy handling of the most destructive youngster. Almost any available timber can good finish.
handwritten_text: HERE is a project that will be welcomed by the family man or father-to-be. Unlike many commercial articles, this chair is solidly built and capable of withstanding the heavy handling of the most destructive youngster. Almost any available timber can good finish.
